{"compiler":{"version":"0.5.16+commit.9c3226ce"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"listing_id","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_public_key","type":"string"}],"name":"buyAuctionItem","outputs":[],"payable":true,"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"listing_id","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_public_key","type":"string"}],"name":"buyNormalItem","outputs":[],"payable":true,"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"listing_id","type":"uint256"}],"name":"close_bidding","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"listing_id","type":"uint256"}],"name":"close_revealing","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"get_bought_item_statuses","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"listing_id","type":"uint256"}],"name":"get_encrypted_string","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"bid","type":"uint256"}],"name":"get_hash","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"","type":"bytes32"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"listing_id","type":"uint256"}],"name":"get_payable_amount","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"listing_id","type":"uint256"}],"name":"get_public_key","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"listing_id","type":"uint256"}],"name":"get_winner","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"_name","type":"string"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_description","type":"string"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_price","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_selling_type","type":"uint256"}],"name":"listItem","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"listing_id","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"hashed_bid","type":"bytes32"}],"name":"place_bid","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"listing_id","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"bid","type":"uint256"}],"name":"reveal_bid","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"message","type":"string"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"listing_id","type":"uint256"}],"name":"send_encrypted_string","outputs":[],"payable":true,"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"viewAvailItems","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"methods":{"buyAuctionItem(uint256,string)":{"params":{"_public_key":"The public key of the buyer which will then be encrypted by the seller and then decrupted later by the buyer","listing_id":"The listing id of the product the buyer is interested in buying."}},"buyNormalItem(uint256,string)":{"params":{"_public_key":"The public key of the buyer which will then be encrypted by the seller and then decrupted later by the buyer","listing_id":"The listing id of the product the buyer is interested in buying."}},"close_bidding(uint256)":{"params":{"listing_id":"The listing id of the product the buyer is interested in buying."}},"close_revealing(uint256)":{"params":{"listing_id":"The listing id of the product the buyer is interested in buying."}},"get_bought_item_statuses()":{"return":"The string containing all the information."},"get_encrypted_string(uint256)":{"params":{"listing_id":"The listing id of the product the buyer just bought."},"return":"The cipher text created by the Seller."},"get_payable_amount(uint256)":{"params":{"listing_id":"The listing id of the product the buyer is interested in buying."}},"get_public_key(uint256)":{"params":{"listing_id":"The listing id of the product the buyer just bought."},"return":"The public key of the buyer"},"get_winner(uint256)":{"params":{"listing_id":"The listing id of the product the buyer is interested in buying."}},"listItem(string,string,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_description":"The description of product being listed","_name":"The name of product being listed","_price":"The price of product being listed","_selling_type":"The selling type of the item"}},"place_bid(uint256,bytes32)":{"params":{"hashed_bid":"The hash of bid the buyer wants to make","listing_id":"The listing id of the product the buyer is interested in buying."}},"reveal_bid(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"bid":"The hash of bid the buyer wants to make","listing_id":"The listing id of the product the buyer is interested in buying."}},"send_encrypted_string(string,uint256)":{"params":{"listing_id":"The listing id of the product the buyer just bought.","message":"The encrypted cipher text created using the sensitive message and Buyer's public key."}},"viewAvailItems()":{"return":"The list is returned"}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"buyAuctionItem(uint256,string)":{"notice":"This public payable function is called by a potential Buyer when he wants to buy a specific listed product which was listed for an Auction. The buyer also gives the price of the prouct in the msg.value while calling which should exactly match with the listed price for a succesful transaction. The function transfers money (stages it) from the Buyer's account to the Contract's address."},"buyNormalItem(uint256,string)":{"notice":"This public payable function is called by a potential Buyer when he wants to buy a specific listed product which are not listed for any auction. The buyer also gives the price of the prouct in the msg.value while calling which should exactly match with the listed price for a succesful transaction. The function transfers money (stages it) from the Buyer's account to the Contract's address."},"close_bidding(uint256)":{"notice":"This public function is called by the Seller when he wants to close biding for a specific listed product."},"close_revealing(uint256)":{"notice":"This public function is called by the Seller when he wants to end revealing period for a specific listed product. This function also calculates the winner and payable amount of the auction"},"get_bought_item_statuses()":{"notice":"This public view function is called by the user to get the states of all sold items. This function returns the status of all the items which are either bought or whose bidding is closed."},"get_encrypted_string(uint256)":{"notice":"This public view function is called by the Buyer of the listed product. This function returns the cipher text to the Buyer."},"get_payable_amount(uint256)":{"notice":"This public function is called by a Buyer when he wants to know the payable amount of the auction of a specific product."},"get_public_key(uint256)":{"notice":"This public view function is called by the Seller of the listed product which was just bought to retrieve the public key of the Buyer to encrypt Password with."},"get_winner(uint256)":{"notice":"This public function is called by a Buyer when he wants to know the winner of the auction of a specific product."},"listItem(string,string,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"This public function is called by the Seller and takes as input the name, description and price of an item and adds it to the list for all the Buyers to see."},"place_bid(uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"This public function is called by a potential Buyer when he wants to place a bid for a specific listed product. The buyer gives a hashed value of the bid while calling the function in addition to the listing_id of the specific product"},"reveal_bid(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"This public function is called by a Buyer when he wants to reveal the actual bid for a specific listed product. The buyer gives the actual bid value while calling the function in addition to the listing_id of the specific product"},"send_encrypted_string(string,uint256)":{"notice":"This public payable function is called by the Seller of the listed product. This function takes in the cipher text created by the Seller and then transfers the Price of the product from the Contract's address to the Seller."},"viewAvailItems()":{"notice":"This public view function lists all the items currently listed along with Listing ID, Name, Description and Price"}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/Netflix.sol":"Netflix"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"project:/contracts/Netflix.sol":{"keccak256":"0x37de89c4e5c4fa810742d81532cf066d37d78ac8ce771401ecd92ac5f7006113","urls":["bzz-raw://ae21e17b5d5667ec151972e9f5fbb547b0ac9b812cc58bdde17bba41d70268ee","dweb:/ipfs/QmNaJ4NWdKiay6Ewji91vajwpxsYHr1a5hVGfib63rfeqt"]}},"version":1}

params._name: The name of product being listed
params._price: The price of product being listed
params._selling_type: The selling type of the item

params.hashed_bid: The hash of bid the buyer wants to make
params.listing_id: The listing id of the product the buyer is interested in buying.

params.bid: The hash of bid the buyer wants to make
params.listing_id: The listing id of the product the buyer is interested in buying.
The listing id of the product the buyer just bought.
params.message: The encrypted cipher text created using the sensitive message and Buyer's public key.

buyAuctionItem(uint256,string).notice: This public payable function is called by a potential Buyer when he wants to buy a specific listed product which was listed for an Auction. The buyer also gives the price of the prouct in the msg.value while calling which should exactly match with the listed price for a succesful transaction. The function transfers money (stages it) from the Buyer's account to the Contract's address.

buyNormalItem(uint256,string).notice: This public payable function is called by a potential Buyer when he wants to buy a specific listed product which are not listed for any auction. The buyer also gives the price of the prouct in the msg.value while calling which should exactly match with the listed price for a succesful transaction. The function transfers money (stages it) from the Buyer's account to the Contract's address.

close_bidding(uint256).notice: This public function is called by the Seller when he wants to close biding for a specific listed product.

close_revealing(uint256).notice: This public function is called by the Seller when he wants to end revealing period for a specific listed product. This function also calculates the winner and payable amount of the auction

get_bought_item_statuses().notice: This public view function is called by the user to get the states of all sold items. This function returns the status of all the items which are either bought or whose bidding is closed.

get_encrypted_string(uint256).notice: This public view function is called by the Buyer of the listed product. This function returns the cipher text to the Buyer.

get_payable_amount(uint256).notice: This public function is called by a Buyer when he wants to know the payable amount of the auction of a specific product.

get_public_key(uint256).notice: This public view function is called by the Seller of the listed product which was just bought to retrieve the public key of the Buyer to encrypt Password with.

get_winner(uint256).notice: This public function is called by a Buyer when he wants to know the winner of the auction of a specific product.

listItem(string,string,uint256,uint256).notice: This public function is called by the Seller and takes as input the name, description and price of an item and adds it to the list for all the Buyers to see.

place_bid(uint256,bytes32).notice: This public function is called by a potential Buyer when he wants to place a bid for a specific listed product. The buyer gives a hashed value of the bid while calling the function in addition to the listing_id of the specific product

reveal_bid(uint256,uint256).notice: This public function is called by a Buyer when he wants to reveal the actual bid for a specific listed product. The buyer gives the actual bid value while calling the function in addition to the listing_id of the specific product

send_encrypted_string(string,uint256).notice: This public payable function is called by the Seller of the listed product. This function takes in the cipher text created by the Seller and then transfers the Price of the product from the Contract's address to the Seller.

viewAvailItems().notice: This public view function lists all the items currently listed along with Listing ID, Name, Description and Price
